      • handleCharacter

        private boolean handleCharacter(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Attempts to handle a typed character.
        Returns:
        whether the character was handled States that need to be looked at: - user is typing characters for composition - user has asked for alternative completions - user is asking for text to be committed
